description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Match falling pieces of fruit to make combinations in this arcade puzzle game.  Four 1-player game modes are available, including Quest Mode, which presents a series of interesting gameplay challenges.  Battle Mode allows you to play against a computer opponent.  Two split-screen 2-player game modes are also available.
